attributes.action: Re introduce corporal punishment in schools and also for juvenile crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of ASBO's and suspended jail sentences which lets be honest are not effective, I would like to see the reinstatement of corporal punishment as a 'short sharp shock' treatment.
Also, I believe that corporal punishment in schools may halt the decline of respect and manners that we as a nation are experiencing. I have noticed that many of these petitions have been rejected - why not put one to the test with the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
